mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ORGANIZATION_NAME as organizationName, a.ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY as organizationCountry, a.DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME as disregardedEntityName, a.CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS as chapterThreeStatus, a.WHETHER as whether, a.CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS as chapterFourStatus, a.USA_TIN as usaTin, a.EIN as ein, a.GIIN_XXX as giinXxx, a.FOREIGN_TIN as foreignTin, a.REFERENCE_NUMBER as referenceNumber, a.FFI as ffi, a.BRANCH_ADDRESS as branchAddress, a.BRANCH_CITY as branchCity, a.BRANCH_COUNTRY as branchCountry, a.GGIN_IF as gginIf, a.NONWITHHOLDING_A as nonwithholdingA, a.CHECKED as checked, a.SIGNATURE as signature, a.SIGNATURE_TIME as signatureTime, a.STATUS as status, a.TYPE as type, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ORGANIZATION_NAME , ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY , DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME , CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS , WHETHER , CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS , USA_TIN , EIN , GIIN_XXX , FOREIGN_TIN , REFERENCE_NUMBER , FFI , BRANCH_ADDRESS , BRANCH_CITY , BRANCH_COUNTRY , GGIN_IF , NONWITHHOLDING_A , CHECKED , SIGNATURE , SIGNATURE_TIME , STATUS , TYPE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{organizationName} , #{organizationCountry} , #{disregardedEntityName} , #{chapterThreeStatus} , #{whether} , #{chapterFourStatus} , #{usaTin} , #{ein} , #{giinXxx} , #{foreignTin} , #{referenceNumber} , #{ffi} , #{branchAddress} , #{branchCity} , #{branchCountry} , #{gginIf} , #{nonwithholdingA} , #{checked} , #{signature} , #{signatureTime} , #{status} , #{type} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

#{accountId} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{organizationName} ,
ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY = #{organizationCountry} ,
DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME = #{disregardedEntityName} ,
CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS = #{chapterThreeStatus} ,
WHETHER = #{whether} ,
CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS = #{chapterFourStatus} ,
USA_TIN = #{usaTin} ,
EIN = #{ein} ,
GIIN_XXX = #{giinXxx} ,
FOREIGN_TIN = #{foreignTin} ,
REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{referenceNumber} ,
FFI = #{ffi} ,
BRANCH_ADDRESS = #{branchAddress} ,
BRANCH_CITY = #{branchCity} ,
BRANCH_COUNTRY = #{branchCountry} ,
GGIN_IF = #{gginIf} ,
NONWITHHOLDING_A = #{nonwithholdingA} ,
CHECKED = #{checked} ,
SIGNATURE = #{signature} ,
SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime} ,
STATUS = #{status} ,
TYPE = #{type} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ORGANIZATION_NAME , ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY , DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME , CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS , WHETHER , CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS , USA_TIN , EIN , GIIN_XXX , FOREIGN_TIN , REFERENCE_NUMBER , FFI , BRANCH_ADDRESS , BRANCH_CITY , BRANCH_COUNTRY , GGIN_IF , NONWITHHOLDING_A , CHECKED , SIGNATURE , SIGNATURE_TIME , STATUS , TYPE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.organizationName} , #{item.organizationCountry} , #{item.disregardedEntityName} , #{item.chapterThreeStatus} , #{item.whether} , #{item.chapterFourStatus} , #{item.usaTin} , #{item.ein} , #{item.giinXxx} , #{item.foreignTin} , #{item.referenceNumber} , #{item.ffi} , #{item.branchAddress} , #{item.branchCity} , #{item.branchCountry} , #{item.gginIf} , #{item.nonwithholdingA} , #{item.checked} , #{item.signature} , #{item.signatureTime} , #{item.status} , #{item.type} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{item.organizationName} , ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY = #{item.organizationCountry} , DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME = #{item.disregardedEntityName} , CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS = #{item.chapterThreeStatus} , WHETHER = #{item.whether} , CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS = #{item.chapterFourStatus} , USA_TIN = #{item.usaTin} , EIN = #{item.ein} , GIIN_XXX = #{item.giinXxx} , FOREIGN_TIN = #{item.foreignTin} , REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{item.referenceNumber} , FFI = #{item.ffi} , BRANCH_ADDRESS = #{item.branchAddress} , BRANCH_CITY = #{item.branchCity} , BRANCH_COUNTRY = #{item.branchCountry} , GGIN_IF = #{item.gginIf} , NONWITHHOLDING_A = #{item.nonwithholdingA} , CHECKED = #{item.checked} , SIGNATURE = #{item.signature} , SIGNATURE_TIME = #{item.signatureTime} , STATUS = #{item.status} , TYPE = #{item.type} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , ORGANIZATION_NAME = #{organizationName} , ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY = #{organizationCountry} , DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME = #{disregardedEntityName} , CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS = #{chapterThreeStatus} , WHETHER = #{whether} , CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS = #{chapterFourStatus} , USA_TIN = #{usaTin} , EIN = #{ein} , GIIN_XXX = #{giinXxx} , FOREIGN_TIN = #{foreignTin} , REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{referenceNumber} , FFI = #{ffi} , BRANCH_ADDRESS = #{branchAddress} , BRANCH_CITY = #{branchCity} , BRANCH_COUNTRY = #{branchCountry} , GGIN_IF = #{gginIf} , NONWITHHOLDING_A = #{nonwithholdingA} , CHECKED = #{checked} , SIGNATURE = #{signature} , SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime} , STATUS = #{status} , TYPE = #{type} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_WBEN_CONTRACT a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
AND a.ORGANIZATION_NAME LIKE '%'||#{organizationName}||'%'
AND a.ORGANIZATION_COUNTRY LIKE '%'||#{organizationCountry}||'%'
AND a.DISREGARDED_ENTITY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{disregardedEntityName}||'%'
AND a.CHAPTER_THREE_STATUS LIKE '%'||#{chapterThreeStatus}||'%'
AND a.WHETHER LIKE '%'||#{whether}||'%'
AND a.CHAPTER_FOUR_STATUS LIKE '%'||#{chapterFourStatus}||'%'
AND a.USA_TIN LIKE '%'||#{usaTin}||'%'
AND a.EIN LIKE '%'||#{ein}||'%'
AND a.GIIN_XXX LIKE '%'||#{giinXxx}||'%'
AND a.FOREIGN_TIN LIKE '%'||#{foreignTin}||'%'
AND a.REFERENCE_NUMBER LIKE '%'||#{referenceNumber}||'%'
AND a.FFI LIKE '%'||#{ffi}||'%'
AND a.BRANCH_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{branchAddress}||'%'
AND a.BRANCH_CITY LIKE '%'||#{branchCity}||'%'
AND a.BRANCH_COUNTRY LIKE '%'||#{branchCountry}||'%'
AND a.GGIN_IF LIKE '%'||#{gginIf}||'%'
AND a.NONWITHHOLDING_A LIKE '%'||#{nonwithholdingA}||'%'
AND a.CHECKED LIKE '%'||#{checked}||'%'
AND a.SIGNATURE LIKE '%'||#{signature}||'%'
AND a.SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime}
AND a.STATUS LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%'
AND a.TYPE LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
AND a.CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}
AND a.CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}
AND a.UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}
AND a.UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
